General.Name: New Trend International Logis-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: New Trend International Logis-Tech Co.,Ltd. provides integrated solutions for logistics and intelligent manufacturing systems in China. The company offers production logistics, smart factory, supply chain information, and distribution center solutions. It also provides software products and technologies, including industrial internet platform, data acquisition platform, data center, digital twin control platform, warehouse control system software, transportation and picking management system software, and supplier relationship management system; and device products and technologies, such as stacker, industrial mobile robot AGV, shuttle car, robot, conveyor, and sorter. In addition, the company offers production planning and design, system integration, software development, and equipment for manufacturing and distribution companies; and customization, electronic control system development, on-site installation and commissioning, customer training, and after-sales services, as well as various other services. The company's system integrated solutions are used in tobacco, new energy batteries, cold chain, petrochemical and petroleum, communication, electronics, daily chemical, food, rail, power, home furnishing, stationery, automobile, and large supermarket industries. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Tody International Technology Park, Shenzhen, China, 518116
